Title: ASP.NET Captcha
Description: A C# port of Jeff Atwood's ASP.NET Captcha Control.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
A C# port of Jeff Atwood's ASP.NET Captcha Control.

Jeff's CodeProject page is here: http://www.codeproject.com/KB/custom-controls/CaptchaControl.aspx
He wrote a CAPTCHA control in VB.NET.

This project ports it to C#.

To use, here's the items you need to add the the web.config.
<httpHandlers>
	<add verb="GET" path="CaptchaImage.aspx" type="WebControlCaptcha.CaptchaImageHandler, WebControlCaptcha" />
</httpHandlers>



<pages>
	<controls>
		<add tagPrefix="captcha" namespace="WebControlCaptcha" assembly="WebControlCaptcha"/>
	</controls>
</pages>
